tha-ap23:6.3: Pavattaṃva supātāhaṃ → pavattapaṇḍupattāni (bj) | pavattañca supātāhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pavattapaṇḍupattāhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap23:11.2: yadā puttaṃ → sadā yuttaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | yadā yuttaṃ (sya1ed) | dayā yuttaṃ (sya2ed)
tha-ap23:14.3: Saddhādhuraṃ vahisi → saddhādhuraṃ jahasi (bj) | sīghaṃ dhuraṃ vahisi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | saddhādhuraṃ pāhisi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap23:21.4: jhāyissasi → jhāpessasi (bj) | yāyissati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | neva yāyasi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
